content: Good morning/evening everybody.We are a small team of software engineers, and were puzzled with a question for a while - why the decentralized casinos are not well adopted yet.So, we created a little MVP that looks promising. Want to share it with you and OF CAUSE it would be really nice to hear your feedback.It is in test now and uses testUSDC ERC-20 token. Deployed on Polygon.  Any ideas, proposals, collaboration offers ARE HEARTILY WELCOMED.The first game we deployed is roulette - it is here : roulette.truecasino.orgThe main website is here: truecasino.orgRandom number is generated using commit-and-reveal scheme. We published it here:https://medium.com/@truecasino_org/random-number-generation-in-a-high-frequency-decentralized-betting-a9b60746eaf7Please, share your opinion if we need to continue.Kind regards,Zorro (Andrey)
